title: The Eternal Battle Between Libre Source Ideology, and the Macintosh
description: Even though I am not exactly there yet, I often like to classify myself as a Libre Source Developer. Let's get into this terminology first.

authors.name: Kushagra Srivastava
authors.title: I write, code, and create. Sometimes all at the same time.

frontMatter.title: The Eternal Battle Between Libre Source Ideology, and the Macintosh
